pentago

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • pentago.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board class to manage board of pentago game. This class manages current state of game board and takes all actions that take place when a move or rotation occurs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Block[][] blocks
      An 2 by 2 array of blocks each contains 9 cells that keeps current board state

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor of board class

      Copy constructor of board class

      • isInvalidMove

        boolean isInvalidMove(int blockNumber,
                      int cellNumber)
        Checks the validity of putting a piece in block and cell determined by block and cell numbers.
        Parameters:
        blockNumber - block number to check
        cellNumber - cell number in block to check
        Returns:
        true if the move is valid, false otherwise

      • getBlockIndex

        private int[] getBlockIndex(int blockNumber)
        Converts block number to cell row and column index.
        Parameters:
        blockNumber - block number
        Returns:
        an array with two members, 0 index indicates computed row and 1 index indicates computed column

      • putPiece

        public void putPiece(Piece piece,
                     int blockNumber,
                     int cellNumber)
        Applying a move by putting specified piece in specified cell of specified block.
        Parameters:
        piece - piece to put
        blockNumber - block number to put piece
        cellNumber - cell number in block to put piece

      • hasWinner

        public boolean hasWinner()
        Checks if current state of board has a winner that is a 5-in-a-row. A 5-in-a-row is state that 5 pieces with same color was in a sequence in vertical, horizontal or diagonal direction.
        Returns:
        true if the game has winner, false otherwise

      • getWinnerPiece

        Piece getWinnerPiece()
        Gets winner piece of board or null if there is no winner, even game not finished or tie state.
        Returns:
        piece color of winner or null if winner does not exist

      • isColorWon

        private boolean isColorWon(Piece piece)
        Checks if specified piece won that is a 5-in-a-row. A 5-in-a-row is state that 5 pieces with same color was in a sequence in vertical, horizontal or diagonal direction.
        Parameters:
        piece - piece that win checks
        Returns:
        true Checks if specified piece won, false otherwise

      • isGameFinished

        public boolean isGameFinished()
        Checks if the game finished, even by winning or tie.
        Returns:
        true if the finished, false otherwise

      • isTie

        private boolean isTie()
        Checks if current game state is a tie state. Tie state is when all cells are full and no winner exist.
        Returns:
        true if game state is tie, false otherwise

      • hasSymmetricalBlock

        boolean hasSymmetricalBlock()
        Checks if current game state has at least one symmetric block. A symmetric block is a block that if rotates in both clockwise and anti-clockwise directions will not change.
        Returns:
        true if current game state has at least one symmetric block, false otherwise

      • getEmptyCells

        public java.util.List<int[]> getEmptyCells()
        Gets block number and cell number of all empty cells in game board.
        Returns:
        list of all empty block and cell numbers

      • get5InARows

        public int get5InARows(Piece piece)
        Gets number of all 5-in-a-rows in game board. 5-in-a-row is a state that 5 pieces with same color was in a sequence in vertical, horizontal or diagonal direction.
        Parameters:
        piece - piece color to check
        Returns:
        all 5-in-a-row count

      • get4InARows

        public int get4InARows(Piece piece)
        Gets number of all 4-in-a-rows in game board. 4-in-a-row is a state that 4 pieces with same color was in a sequence in vertical, horizontal or diagonal direction.
        Parameters:
        piece - piece color to check
        Returns:
        all 4-in-a-row count

        Returns:
        all 4-in-a-row count
